header.alwaysMakeSureWarning: Always make sure the URL is

earn.liquidityRemainsPool: When you claim without withdrawing your liquidity remains in the mining pool.
earn.attemptingToStakeError: Attempting to stake without approval or a signature. Please contact support.
earn.whenYouWithdrawWarning: When you withdraw, your {{ symbol }} is claimed and your Pangolin Liquidity tokens, PGL, are returned to you. You will no longer earn {{ symbol }} rewards on this liquidity. Your original token liquidity will remain in its liquidity pool.
earn.whenYouWithdrawSingleSideWarning: When you withdraw, your {{ symbol }} is claimed and your {{ pngSymbol}} is returned to you. You will no longer earn {{ symbol }} rewards on this {{ pngSymbol}}.
earn.removeWarning: You are removing liquidity from this pool. This action will give you back your tokens. Alternatively you can choose to stake your tokens to farm to earn rewards.

modalView.confirmTransaction: Confirm this transaction in your wallet

navigationTabs.useThisTool: Use this tool to find pairs that don't automatically appear in the interface.
navigationTabs.whenYouAddLiquidityInfo: When you add liquidity, you are given pool tokens representing your position. These tokens automatically earn fees proportional to your share of the pool, and can be redeemed at any time.
navigationTabs.removingPoolTokensInfo: Removing pool tokens converts your position back into underlying tokens at the current rate, proportional to your share of the pool. Accrued fees are included in the amounts you receive.

popups.tokenListUpdated: The token list " {{oldList}} " has been updated to
popups.updateAvailable: An update is available for the token list " {{oldList}} "

positionCard.byAddingLiquidityInfo:
By adding liquidity you'll earn 0.25% of all trades on this pair proportional to your share of the pool.
 Fees are added to the pool, accrue in real time and can be claimed by withdrawing your liquidity.

searchModal.tokensPairsHelper: These tokens are commonly paired with other tokens.
searchModal.findToken: Find a token by searching for its name or symbol or by pasting its address below.
searchModal.confirmListRemovalPrompt: Please confirm you would like to remove this list by typing REMOVE
searchModal.tokenListHelper: Token lists are an open specification for lists of ERC20 tokens. You can use any token list by entering its URL below. Beware that third party token lists can contain fake or malicious ERC20 tokens.

settings.expertInfo: Expert mode turns off the confirm transaction prompt and allows high slippage trades that often result in bad rates and lost funds.
settings.expertWarningCAPS: ONLY USE THIS MODE IF YOU KNOW WHAT YOU ARE DOING.
settings.confirmExpertMode: Please type the word "confirm" to enable expert mode.
settings.expertModeHelper: Bypasses confirmation modals and allows high slippage trades. Use at your own risk.

swap.priceImpactHelper: The difference between the market price and estimated price due to trade size.
swap.liquidityProviderHelper: A portion of each trade (0.30%) goes to liquidity providers as a protocol incentive.
swap.routingHelper: Routing through these tokens resulted in the best price for your trade.
swap.transactionRevertHelper: Your transaction will revert if there is a large, unfavorable price movement before it is confirmed.
swap.outputEstimated: Output is estimated. You will receive at least {{amount}} {{currencySymbol}} or the transaction will revert.
swap.inputEstimated: Input is estimated. You will sell at most {{amount}} {{currencySymbol}} or the transaction will revert.
swap.priceImpactMinPrompt: This swap has a price impact of at least {{ priceImpact }}%. Please type the word "confirm" to continue with this swap.
swap.priceImpactHighPrompt: This swap has a price impact of at least {{ priceImpact }}%. Please confirm that you would like to continue with this swap.

tokenWarningModal.anyoneCanCreateWarning: Anyone can create an ERC-20 token on Avalanche with any name, including creating fake versions of existing tokens and tokens that claim to represent projects that do not have a token.
tokenWarningModal.loadArbitraryWarning: This interface can load arbitrary tokens by token addresses. Please take extra caution and do your research when interacting with arbitrary ERC-20 tokens.
tokenWarningModal.purchaseArbitraryWarning: If you purchase an arbitrary token, you may be unable to sell it back.

transactionConfirmation.confirmTransaction: Confirm this transaction in your wallet

transactionSettings.transactionRevertSlippageHelper: Your transaction will revert if the price changes unfavorably by more than this percentage.
transactionSettings.transactionRevertDeadlineHelper: Your transaction will revert if it is pending for more than this long.
transactionSettings.transactionActiveExpertMode: Very high slippage, activate expert mode to be able to use more than 50%

vote.earnedPng: Earned {{ pngSymbol }} tokens represent voting shares in Pangolin governance.
vote.canEitherVote: You can either vote on each proposal yourself or delegate your votes to a third party.
vote.confirmTransaction: Confirm this transaction in your wallet

walletModal.pleaseConnectAvalanche: Please connect to the appropriate Avalanche network.
walletModal.errorConnectingRefresh: Error connecting. Try refreshing the page.
walletModal.learnMoreWallet: Learn more about setting up a wallet

web3ReactManager.unknownError: Oops! An unknown error occurred. Please refresh the page, or visit from another browser or device.

gasFeeAlert.transactionsNotAccept: Transactions will not be accepted unless the gas fee is set to {{ gasPrice }} gwei.

addLiquidity.outputEstimated: Output is estimated. If the price changes by more than {{ allowedSlippage }}% your transaction will revert.
addLiquidity.firstLP: You are the first liquidity provider.
addLiquidity.ratioTokens: The ratio of tokens you add will set the price of this pool.
addLiquidity.happyRate: Once you are happy with the rate click supply to review.

airdrop.claimPeriodEnded: The airdrop claim period has ended.
airdrop.connectWalletViewLiquidity: Connect to a wallet to view your liquidity.
airdrop.noAvailableClaim: You have no {{ pngSymbol }} available claim.
airdrop.noUniNoSushi: You have no UNI or SUSHI tokens. Please follow the tutorial here to add UNI or SUSHI tokens to your wallet.

earnPage.depositPangolinLiquidity: Deposit your Pangolin Liquidity Provider PGL tokens to receive {{ pngSymbol }}, the Pangolin protocol governance token.
earnPage.depositPangolinStaking: Deposit and stake your {{ pngSymbol }} tokens to earn more tokens.
earnPage.pangolinGovernanceProposalResult: As a result of Pangolin governance proposal 1, Pangolin is changing staking contracts! After approximately 08:59 UTC on 4/19, all staking rewards will be distributed to the new staking contracts. Before the switch, all rewards will still be distributed to the old contracts. To avoid interruptions to yield farming rewards, you need to unstake your liquidity from the old contracts and restake in the new contracts. You do not need to remove liquidity from your pools or alter your positions.
earnPage.pglTokenRequired: PGL tokens are required. Once you've added liquidity to the {{ poolHandle }} pool you can stake your liquidity tokens on this page.
earnPage.automagically: When you withdraw, the contract will automagically claim {{ pngSymbol }} on your behalf!
earnPage.migrateDescription: Pangolin has changed tokonomics. You will need to migrate your staked PGL to new contract

pool.liquidityProvidersEarn: Liquidity providers earn a 0.25% fee on all trades proportional to their share of the pool. Fees are added to the pool, accrue in real time and can be claimed by withdrawing your liquidity.
pool.connectWalletToView: Connect to a wallet to view your liquidity.
pool.noSeePoolJoined: Don't see a pool you joined?
pool.successWithdraw: Your liquidity removed from farm, And accrued rewards claimed!
pool.importDescription1: With import function you can look for pools that doesn’t appear in 'Your Pools' section.
pool.importDescription2: Just choose the underlying coins that was in your pool.
pool.createPairDescription: With create function you can create a new pair. Just search the coins that you want to create a pair for and system will either finds the pool if exists on Pangolin or creates a brand new one if its not.
pool.addLiquidityDescription: With the add liquidity function you add liquidity to a pair. Just search for the coins you want to add liquidity to and the system will find the pool if it exists in Pangolin or create a new one if it doesn't.
pool.createStorageContract: On Hedera, all smart contracts need to pay fees for utilising space on the ledger. These are storage fees and auto renewal fees. You'll need to create a Storage contract in order to farm. The storage will be free, but in future you will be required to pay auto renewal fees. These are about 2 cents. So we recommend keeping $1 on HBAR in your wallet at all times to ensure you don't experience any issues.

poolFinder.connectToFind: Connect to a wallet to find pools
poolFinder.selectTokenToFind: Select a token to find your liquidity.
poolFinder.noLiquidityYet: You don't have liquidity in this pool yet.

swapPage.betaRelease: This is a BETA release and should be used at your own risk!
swapPage.connectWalletViewPortFolio: Connect to a wallet to check your portfolio.
swapPage.notFoundToken: Not found tokens on this chain

buyPage.buyAvaxInfo: Buy AVAX with fiat from our partner Wyre.
buyPage.privacyInfo: Pangolin does not store your purchase history or any personal data.

votePage.earnedPngTokens: {{ pngSymbol }} tokens represent voting shares in Pangolin governance. You can vote on each proposal yourself or delegate your votes to a third party.
votePage.eligibleToVote: To be eligible to vote, you must hold {{ pngSymbol }} in your wallet and delegate it at the start of voting. After voting has begun, you may pool or spend your {{ pngSymbol }}.
votePage.governanceVotes: Governance votes are decided by simple majority. There is no quorum threshold.
votePage.proposalCommunityMembers: Proposals submitted by community members will appear here.
votePage.minimumThreshold: A minimum threshold of 1,000,000 {{ pngSymbol }} is required to submit proposals

IDOPage.pangolinIDODescription: Initial DEX Offerings (IDO) allows projects to crowdfund their native tokens on decentralized exchanges. We've partnered with amazing teams to bring great projects to the Avalanche community.
IDOPage.IDOAnnounced: IDOs publicly announced will appear here.

migratePage.startMigratingNowDescription: Below you will find all the Farms you will need to migrate to Pangolin's V2 Contracts
migratePage.migrateWithDescription: We have designed an elegant wizard, which will help guide you through the process of migrating your Farms
migratePage.moveYourTokensToNewContracts: Migrate your Farms to Pangolin V2
migratePage.migrationModalDescription: Select the pools you wish to migrate
migratePage.poolInfoDescription: Select the amount you wish to migrate
migratePage.moveYourTokensToNewContractsDescription: As part of Pangolin's roll out to new improved contracts, you will need to migrate your Farms. If you need any help or guidance, please click on the “Learn” button.

dashboardPage.greetings: Greetings kind guests! Let's ape in today…

stakePage.stakeAndEarn: Stake Your {{ pngSymbol }} and Earn Rewards!
stakePage.stakePng: Stake your PNG token to share platform fees

error.attemptingToConfirmApproval: Attempting to confirm without approval or a signature. Please contact support.

sarStake.confirmDescription: Staking creates a SAR NFT position. This NFT manages your {{ symbol }} tokens and APR. Your APR will change based on the length of stake.

sarStakeMore.confirmDescription: This adds {{ symbol }} to your SAR NFT position. Your original balance continues from the same APR. The APR of your newly added tokens starts from 0% and changes based on the length of stake. Your NFT will show the average.

sarUnstake.confirmDescription: You’re about to unstake your NFT position which restarts the APR of the remaining balance from 0%. Is that what you want to do?
sarUnstake.unstakeWarning: Unstaking restarts the APR of this position from 0%. Instead of unstaking, you can also sell your NFT position on a secondary market.

sarCompound.successSubmit: You have successfully compounded your position.
sarCompound.description: Please be aware that compounding your rewards may decrease your average APR. Newly staked tokens start from 0, while the old tokens will continue with the same APR. This creates the average that is displayed to you.

sarClaim.description: Claiming your rewards will restart the APR of your position from 0%. Instead of claiming, you can also compound your rewards.
sarClaim.successSubmit: You have successfully claimed your rewards
sarClaim.claimWarning: Due to the nature of SAR staking system claiming your rewards will drop your APR to 0. You can instead compound your rewards without losing your APR.

sarPortfolio.noPositions:
You don't have a staking position NFT.
LET'S GET YOU ONE!

pangoChef.claimWarning1: When you claim without withdrawing, your liquidity remains in the farm.
pangoChef.claimWarning2: Claiming your rewards will claim all outstanding tokens, including Super Farm rewards and restarts your APR to 0%. Instead you may choose to compound.
pangoChef.compoundWarning: Compounding your rewards for {{ token0 }}-{{ token1 }} farm will get your rewards staked into {{ stakeToken0 }}-{{ stakeToken1 }} farm. You need to add equal value of {{ compoundToken }} token to your accrued {{ png }} rewards.
pangoChef.compoundAmountWarning: You need to add {{ amount }} {{ symbol }} to compound. Please beware that Compounding may slightly decrease your APR.
pangoChef.compoundAmountWarning2: Be careful that you will be locking your {{ token0 }} {{ token1 }} pool till you claim the rewards of this pool.
pangoChef.highVolalityWarning: Too early, try in few hours
pangoChef.compoundSuccess: You have successfully compounded your farm.
pangoChef.removeWarning: Removing any amount from farm will get your APR to 0. You can instead compound your rewards without losing your APR.
pangoChef.lockingPoolZeroWarning: You can’t remove your liquidity or claim your rewards from this farm. To do this you first need to either claim or remove your stake from this farms:
pangoChef.decreaseWarning: Your apr will decrease because the new compounded part starts with apr 0 and an average will be taken between the old and new part.

positionCard.outOfRangeTooltipContent: The price of this pool is outside of your selected range. Your position is not currently earning fees.
positionCard.inRangeTooltipContent: The price of this pool is within your selected range. Your position is currently earning fees.
positionCard.openTooltipContent: This position is opened by the user.
positionCard.closedTooltipContent: This position is closed by the user.

addLiquidity.feeTierTooltipContext: Select your pool earnings percentage. Note that swaps favor lowest fee rates.

feeTier.earnFees: The % you will earn in fees.

priceRange.title: Set Price Range
priceRange.infoContext: The amount may adjust to fit tick size when setting a price range.

elixir.positionNotFound: You don’t have any open or closed positions to show.
elixir.positionNotExist: Your active concentrated liquidity positions will appear here
elixir.invalidPriceRange: Invalid range selected. The min price must be lower than the max price.
elixir.notEarnFee: Your position will not earn fees or be used in trades until the market price moves into your range.
elixir.singleAssetDeposit: The market price is outside your specified price range. Single-asset deposit only.
elixir.initializedLiquidity: This pool must be initialized before you can add liquidity. To initialize, select a starting price for the pool. Then, enter your liquidity price range and deposit amount. Gas fees will be higher than usual due to the initialization transaction.

loader.bottomText: Your transaction is still being processed. Sit back and relax. There is nothing you need to do on your end. It is also not possible to speed up this part of the process. If it takes an unusually long time for this to process, please do not worry. your funds are not missing.

bridgeInputsWidget.tooltip: The final amount might change due to slippage but will not fall below {{ amount }} {{ currency }}

portfolio.connectToseePortfolio: Connect a wallet to see your Portfolio

buy.redirectCoinbasePay: You will be redirected to Coinbase Pay shortly, if not please click below button
buy.useCoinbasePay: To use Coinbase Pay first you need to connect your wallet to Pangolin dApp. Please proceed by clicking button below.
